channel.title: -illuminesce glass art-

item.title: New glass solo exhibit: Dinosaur Town in Koenji
item.description: I'll be showing my glass art at Potter Café in Koenji, with all of the dinosaurs I've made until now. I hope you enjoy!

item.title: My first glass show at SARAU TOKYO
item.description: On March 16th, I had my first glass art show at the queer art event SARAU TOKYO in Roppongi. Photos and more in the link.
